name: Sour Cookies
description: Sour Cookies is a blend of Girl Scout Cookies and Sour Diesel. This cross combines the medical-grade sedation of GSC with the uplifted, cerebral, mood enhancing effects of Sour Diesel. The smell is doughy and pungent with overtones of fuel and hash. Enjoy this strain in small doses to harness the sativa-dominant effects, but with consistent use, this strain envelops the consumer in a weighted couch-lock that can persist for over an hour.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Talkative, Euphoric, Energetic, Pain, Inflammation, Nausea, Depression, Stress, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious
